{{Client function}}

{{New items|3.0135|1.3.5|
This function returns an [[/element.md|element]] that corresponds to the game camera 
}}
{{Note|Using attachElements with the camera and the main player can interfere with movement}}
{{Note|Using setElementPosition/Rotation/Matrix on the camera element will automatically clear any target set with [[/setCameraTarget.md|setCameraTarget]]}}
==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
element getCamera ()
</syntaxhighlight> 

===Returns===
Returns an [[/element.md|element]] that corresponds to the game camera 

==Example== 
This example attaches (fixes) the camera to a vehicle.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
local cam = getCamera()
setElementPosition( cam, 0,0,0 )  -- Clear camera target
local myVehicle = getPedOccupiedVehicle(localPlayer)
attachElements( cam, myVehicle, 0,-4,2, -20,0,0 )
</syntaxhighlight>
